title: Start
body:
This story starts at the beginning with the near extinction of the "Worst Generation."
A species of fire-bending, flame-built, havoc-wreaking creatures.
This is the very last of its kind.
A being made and created from fire, traveling with nothing but remnants of flames. 
A being with one goal: to restore his lineage. He must keep his flames intact along his journey.
A journey to be discovered by you - The Nameless Flame.



Click to Start
